text: Canaan was an ancient region in the Levant. In the Bible, it was the land promised to Abraham and his children by God. ==History== The Canaanites lived in the area from about 2,000 BC until the time of the Bible. The area covers part of the area that is now Israel, Palestine, Syria and Lebanon. ==Related pages== * Torah * Levant * Iron Age * Israelites * Bronze Age ==References== Category:History of Syria Category:History of Jordan Category:History of Lebanon Category:Ancient Israel and Judah Category:History of the Middle East Category:Former countries in the Middle East
title: Canaan
